long_description: The easy-to-use Swix FX Wide Ski/Snowboard Vise allows vertical and horizontal mounting options. C-clamp screw-mounting design attaches easily to workbench or almost any flat surface. Vertical center slot securely holds snowboards or skis for edge work; adjustable rubber grip pads for horizontal placement allows waxing of the base.
short_description: The easy-to-use Swix FX Wide Ski/Snowboard Vise allows vertical and horizontal mounting options.
